title: Requires every hospital engaging in construction, addition or remodeling to submit certain plans and specifications for such building
summary: Requires every hospital engaging in the construction of, addition to or remodeling of a building to submit to the commissioner of health the plans and specifications of such building relating to heating, ventilation and air conditioning, air intake, pest prevention, radon levels, lighting, sanitation and drainage; also requires such hospitals to consider the siting of such building in relation to toxic sites.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to plans and specifications for hospitals
